data.name: WAKFU - Book III: Dragon Mountain
data.detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the https://support.steampowered.com/kb_article.php?ref=8699-OASD-1871">Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


About the Video


WAKFU Animation is back with a new adventure in 3 Special Episodes !
The Quest for the Six Eliatrope Dofus - Book III: Dragon Mountain

In this last Episode, getting back to the Sadida Kingdom, Yugo discovers that Percedal has decided to directly attack the root cause of the problem: the terrifying Ogrest. The Iop warrior has gone to Mount Zinit. To Yugo, it's obvious they must go help him, no matter the cost.
But strangely, his brother, Adamai, doesn't agree. Did his visit to the Kingdom of the Winds disturb him? No matter! It's time for actions, not questions! Yugo has made his decision : he'll go help Percedal, with or without Adamai! The destiny of the World of Twelve is in our heroes' hands, now more than ever.

Discover the ultimate episode of WAKFU: the Quest for the Six Eliatrope Dofus, concluding a story started centuries ago !

Save money by purchasing the Season Pass, also available on Steam. It will give you access to the 3 episodes of the Quest for the Six Eliatrope Dofus as they are released this summer:

Book I: The Throne of Ice
Book II: Ush
Book III: Dragon Mountain

You can discover the game where the story continues by clicking here. Enter: WAKFU, the strategic and tactical MMORPG!

In this last Episode, getting back to the Sadida Kingdom, Yugo discovers that Percedal has decided to directly attack the root cause of the problem: the terrifying Ogrest. The Iop warrior has gone to Mount Zinit.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.
